text: Any here who works with BAM files regularly and have any interest in helping improving the packages "around" it? Turns out there are a lot of accessory packages to XAM, and some decisions needs to be made.

elements.text: Any here who works with BAM files regularly and have any interest in helping improving the packages "around" it? Turns out there are a lot of accessory packages to XAM, and some decisions needs to be made.

text: Usually I just use process BAM files with other programs (mainly SAMT00LS, obviously), and I’m also fresh-new in Julia; but I’m also working on something now and consider using BAM files directly, so I may be of help too.
